text: يَـٰحَسْرَةً عَلَى ٱلْعِبَادِ ۚ مَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ

translation.en.sahih: How regretful for the servants. There did not come to them any messenger except that they used to ridicule him.
translation.id.indonesian: Alangkah besarnya penyesalan terhadap hamba-hamba itu, tiada datang seorang rasulpun kepada mereka melainkan mereka selalu memperolok-olokkannya.
